name: Kombi Explorer Gloves - Men's
description:
Slip into warmth when exploring backcountry lines or riding exposed chairlifts. The Explorer Gloves are packed with down and a weather-proof membrane to keep your hands protected when the mercury really drops. Thindown insulation sandwiches a layer of down fibres between two woven layers to provide even distribution of maximum warmth.Shell is breathable Flexshell fabric and leather.Premium leather palms are tough but supple for ease of movement.Waterguard® waterproof, breathable membrane for keeping moisture at bay.80g Thindown® insulation offers 360 degrees of warmth.Wool-blend lining wicks moisture and is naturally antimicrobial.Adjustable wrist strap and cuff drawcord seals out snow and drafts.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
